api_list.api_description: Retrieves a character by its ID.
Fetches a single character by ID.

query: Can you provide details about the character with ID 3 from both the Final Space and Rick and Morty universes?

api_list.api_description: Retrieves all episodes, with options to sort and limit the results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned.

api_list.api_description: Fetches all episodes, with filtering options.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of episodes to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter for names containing this string.

query: What episodes are available in the Final Space and Rick and Morty universes? Please list them with details.

api_list.api_description: Retrieves all locations, with options to sort and limit results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned.

api_list.api_description: Fetches all locations, with filtering options.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of locations to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter for names containing this string.

query: Can you provide a list of all notable locations from both the Final Space and Rick and Morty shows?
